mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO as userNo, USER_ID as userId, NAME as name, NICK as nick, PASSWORD as password, EMAIL as email, ROLE as role, CREATED_AT as createdAt FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_NO, USER_ID, NAME, NICK, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ROLE, CREATED_AT, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
